702118f-a.text:
Westchester Avenue, north side, east from a point midway between Castle Hill and Glebe Avenues. Westchester Avenue, upon which is the elevated structure of the I.R.T. subway, bends northward slightly beyond Glebe Avenue.
April 16, 1938
P. L. Sperr
702118f-a.folder: Westchester Avenue & Castle Hill Avenue, Bronx, NY
702118f-a.original_title: Bronx: Westchester Avenue - Castle Hill Avenue

702119f-a.title: Bronx: Westchester Avenue - Castle Hill
702119f-a.text:
Westchester Avenue, south side, between Castle Hill and Glebe Avenues, showing an old 2-story frame house, located on the grounds of bt. Peters Rectory. The view is from underneath
the elevated trestle of the I.R.T. subway.
April 16, 1938
P. L. Sperr
702119f-a.folder: Westchester Avenue & Castle Hill, Bronx, NY
